title: Overview
text:
I have two projects to share:
- Smart Fridge Web App
- Paper Trading Web App



Link : WAZY


This is a project made for the hackathon “MongoDB AI Hackathon: Code for a Cause”.



This project uses LLM to read recipe database and generate recipes based on the user’s fridge content.




Lin Zhenming
Shaun Liew






Link : Intelli-Foods


This is a project made for the module INF2003 Database Systems.



This project is a demonstration of usage of both Relational (PostgreSQL) and Non-Relational (MongoDB) database in performing CRUD operations onto finance data queried from Yahoo Finance.




Lin Zhenming
Manesh Kaliannan
Toh Zhen Wei
How Ai Ying
Jasbir Kaur
Chong Ying Ee

title: Overview
text:
Playing Squadbusters





I usually play this game before, after and during class.

What is this game?
Squad Buster is the latest game released by giant game company Supercell


Who do I play with?
I usually play this game alone, but sometimes I would play with my bestfriend Lionel or my cousin Loh.

title: Overview

I am a super Marvel fan

My favourite movie
